title: A bug report of the new client and a two suggestions
body:
> _I know that I should post it on other board. But I am not high level enough. I'm sorry._

I  want to report a bug and I have suggestions  to the training mode and instant feedback system.

I'm actually from Taiwan Server and I'm not sure if the terms I use below are correct. You tolerance is appreciated. I got banned for being toxic/shit talking recently and I am receiving a 10-game team chat restriction. In the old client, it shows how many game left I will be in team chat restriction every time I login, however, in the new client,  it keep showing 10 games left. That's the bug.

I tried the training mode, I think it will be great if I can sommon the Baron instead of fastforwarding the game.

Finally, in the instant feedback system, I think "Intentional Feeding" is not good enough to report some intentionally terribly played players. Some multi-queue players just keep feeding, ignoring teammates' alert and starting team fight blindly.

replies.body:
Since you're intending to leave feedback on these features, I recommend reposting this to our [**Miscellaneous Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous), where this type of feedback goes.

If you have any questions, feel free to let me know.
It requires me to be Level 7 or higher to post. I just want this thought to be transmitted to Riots, can you help? Thx a lot

Unfortunately, I'm not on the teams that work on those features, so I can't pass the feedback on for you. If you play more matches in League, you can hit level 7 and then repost this to the Misc Boards so your feedback has more visibility. ^.^
